job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen en realiseren we de digitale sales en service mogelijkheden voor onze klanten door middel van toonaangevende strategieën en technologieën zoals Salesforce en MuleSoft.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of designing and realizing digital sales and service capabilities, which falls under traditional software development and integration using specific platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zal bedrijfsprocessen transformeren naar technische oplossingen en doet dit door middel van code schrijven en configureren
job_tasks.justification: Transforming business processes into technical solutions through coding and configuration is a direct example of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: leveren van applicaties (bijv. user interfaces, sales en service processes, B2C en B2B communities, APIs, mobile apps, Einstein of Heroku);
job_tasks.justification: Listing the delivery of various application components like UIs, APIs, and mobile apps clearly falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Ernaar streven om altijd kwaliteit en veiligheid voorop te stellen in alles wat we doen.
job_tasks.justification: Prioritizing quality and security in all actions is a fundamental aspect of robust software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zult werken met klanten die vaak Agile werken om nieuwe functionaliteit te ontwikkelen en implementeren met behulp van het toonaangevende SaaS-platform, Salesforce.
job_tasks.justification: Developing and implementing new functionality using a SaaS platform (Salesforce) within an Agile framework is a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je wordt verwacht samen te werken met de klant en betrokken te zijn bij zowel functionele als technische workshops om klantvereisten te verzamelen en te documenteren.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with clients in workshops to gather and document requirements is a standard part of the software development lifecycle, bridging business needs and technical implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Uitdagingen en verbeteringen communiceren aan de klant en de klanten en eindgebruikers ondersteunen tijdens en na de Go-Live.
job_tasks.justification: Communicating challenges and improvements to clients, and supporting users post-launch, are integral parts of the software development and integration process, focusing on delivery and support.

job_tasks.phrase: Innovatieve technologieën zoals GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants en andere geavanceerde oplossingen verkennen en toepassen, met een focus op het bevorderen van creatief denken en het stimuleren van impactvolle zakelijke innovatie.
job_tasks.justification: Exploring and applying innovative technologies like GenAI, Conversational AI, and Voice Assistants, with a focus on business innovation, indicates a task related to leveraging advanced AI technologies, which can involve data aspects or model application.

job_tasks.phrase: een diploma in hoger/universitair onderwijs op het gebied van Computer Science, Software Engineering, AI, (Technische) Informatica, of andere relevante opleidingen;
job_tasks.justification: While an educational requirement, it points towards a foundational understanding of software engineering principles necessary for the role.

job_tasks.phrase: Ervaring met programmeertalen zoals Apex (erg vergelijkbaar met Java), JavaScript, SQL, HTML en CSS.
job_tasks.justification: Experience with programming languages is a direct requirement for software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Een goed begrip hebben van versiebeheersystemen, zoals Git, en een basiskennis van hoe je je updates naar productie kunt vrijgeven volgens CICD-principes.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding version control systems (Git) and CI/CD principles for production releases falls under operations and MLOps, essential for software deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennis en ervaring met methoden en technieken zoals Salesforce, Force.com en Agile/SCRUM zijn een pluspunt.
job_tasks.justification: Knowledge of specific platforms (Salesforce) and methodologies (Agile/SCRUM) are directly related to software development and integration practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Aangetoonde interesse in het ontwikkelen van klantprocessen en een sterke enthousiasme voor implementaties met gebruikmaking van GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants, enzovoort.
job_tasks.justification: Enthusiasm for implementations using GenAI and Conversational AI suggests a role that will involve applying these technologies, which often requires understanding their data and implementation aspects.

soft_skills.phrase: Je wordt verwacht samen te werken met de klant en betrokken te zijn bij zowel functionele als technische workshops om klantvereisten te verzamelen en te documenteren.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with the client and involvement in workshops for requirement gathering.

soft_skills.phrase: Uitdagingen en verbeteringen communiceren aan de klant en de klanten en eindgebruikers ondersteunen tijdens en na de Go-Live.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights communication of challenges and improvements to clients, and supporting end-users.

soft_skills.phrase: ontwikkel jezelf tot Developer, Architect, Release Engineer of System Integrator.
soft_skills.justification: Encourages self-development into various technical roles, implying a need for continuous learning.

soft_skills.phrase: neem je deel aan het Delivery Excellence Program, dat bestaat uit trainingen, kennisdelingssessies en certificeringsmogelijkheden.
soft_skills.justification: Participation in a program with training, knowledge sharing, and certifications directly indicates a focus on learning and development.

soft_skills.phrase: natuurlijk wil je elke dag nieuwe dingen ontdekken en leren en wil je tot de kern komen van het echte probleem van de klant.
soft_skills.justification: Expresses a desire to discover and learn new things daily, which is a core aspect of adaptability and continuous learning.

soft_skills.phrase: wil je tot de kern komen van het echte probleem van de klant.
soft_skills.justification: Focuses on getting to the core of the customer's problem, which is a key element of problem-solving.

soft_skills.phrase: Innovatieve technologieën zoals GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants en andere geavanceerde oplossingen verkennen en toepassen, met een focus op het bevorderen van creatief denken en het stimuleren van impactvolle zakelijke innovatie.
soft_skills.justification: Exploring and applying innovative technologies with a focus on driving business innovation suggests an innovative and proactive approach.

soft_skills.phrase: een uitstekende beheersing van het geschreven en gesproken Nederlands en Engels is een vereiste.
soft_skills.justification: Requirement for excellent command of Dutch and English indicates a strong need for communication skills.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks (1.A.1) such as designing, developing, integrating, and deploying applications using platforms like Salesforce, Apex, JavaScript, and Git. While it mentions exploring and applying innovative technologies like GenAI, Conversational AI, and Voice Assistants (1.B.3), these are presented as areas to explore and apply within the context of building digital sales and service capabilities, rather than the core focus of model development or deep AI specialization. The role is primarily about building software solutions that *may* incorporate these AI technologies, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a software engineering role with an emphasis on specific platforms like Salesforce. The mention of AI technologies is present but framed as an area of exploration and application within a broader software development context. The tasks are predominantly categorized under 'Software Development & Integration' (Macro-Category A), with only a few mentions of AI technology exploration falling under 'Data Engineering & Management' (Macro-Category B). This clear distinction supports the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile. The confidence is high, but not a perfect 5, as the AI aspect is mentioned as an area to explore rather than a deeply integrated core responsibility.
